Verses: 1 keeleyaaththiyanaana Yepthaa Balaththa Paraakkiramasaaliyaayirundhaan; Avan Parasthreeyin Kumaaran; Kileyaadh Avanaip Petraan.

2 kileyaaththin Manaiviyum Avanukkuk Kumaarargalaip Petraal; Avan Manaivi Petra Kumaarar Periyavargalaana Pinbu, Avargal Yepthaavai Nokki: Unakku Engal Thagappan Veettile Sudhandharam Illai; Nee Anniya Sthreeyin Magan Endru Solli Avanaith Thuraththinaargal.
3 appozhudhu Yepthaa: Than Sagodhararai Vittu Odippoi, Thopthesaththile Kudiyirundhaan; Veenaraana Manushar Yepthaavode Koodikkondu, Avanodekooda Yuththaththirkup Povaargal.
4 sila Naalaikkuppinbu, Ammon Puththirar Isravelin Mel Yuththampanninaargal.
5 avargal Isravelinmel Yuththam Pannumpodhu Keeleyaaththinmooppar Yepthaavaith Thopthesaththilirundhu Azhaiththuvarappoi,
6 yepthaavai Nokki: Nee Vandhu, Naangal Ammon Puththirarodu Yuththam Panna Engal Senaapadhiyaayirukka Vendum Endraargal.

7 adharku Yepthaa Keeleyaaththin Moopparaip Paarththu: Neengal Allavaa Ennaip Pagaiththu, En Thagappan Veettilirundhu Ennaith Thuraththinavargal? Ippozhudhu Ungalukku Aabaththu Nerittirukkira Samayaththil Neengal Ennidaththil En Varugireergal Endraan.

8 adharkuk Keeleyaaththinmooppar Yepthaavai Nokki: Nee Engaludanekooda Vandhu, Ammon Puththirarodu Yuththampanni, Keeleyaaththinkudigalaagiya Engal Anaivarmelum Thalaivanaayirukka Vendum; Idharkaaga Ippozhudhu Unnidaththil Vandhom Endraargal.

9 adharku Yepthaa: Ammon Puththirarode Yuththampanna, Neengal Ennaith Thirumba Azhaiththupponapinbu, Karththar Avargalai En Munnilaiyaai Oppukkoduththaal, Ennai Ungalukkuth Thalaivanaai Vaippeergalaa Endru Keeleyaaththinmoopparaik Kettaan.
10 keeleyaaththinmooppar Yepthaavaip Paarththu: Naangal Un Vaarththaiyinpadiye Seyyaavittaal, Karththar Namakku Nadunindru Ketpaaraaga Endraargal.

11 appozhudhu Yepthaa Keeleyaaththinmoopparode Koodapponaan; Janangal Avanaith Thangalmel Thalaivanum Senaapadhiyumaaga Vaiththaargal. Yepthaa Than Kaariyangalaiyellaam Mispaavile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyile Sonnaan.

12 pinbu Yepthaa Ammon Puththirarin Raajaavinidaththirku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi: Nee En Dhesaththil Enakku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanna Varugiradharku, Enakkum Unakkum Enna Vazhakku Irukkiradhu Endru Ketkachchonnaan.

13 ammon Puththirarin Raajaa Yepthaavin Sthaanaapadhigalai Nokki: Isravelar Egipthilirundhu Varugirapodhu, Arnon Thuvakki Yaabokmattum, Yordhaanmattum Irukkira En Dhesaththaik Kattikkondaargale; Ippozhudhu Adhai Enakku Samaadhaanamaaith Thirumbakkoduththuvida Vendum Endru Sollungal Endraan.
14 yepthaa Marupadiyum Ammon Puththirarin Raajaavinidaththirku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi, Avanukku Solla Sonnadhaavadhu:
15 yepthaa Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Isravelar Movaabiyarin Dhesaththaiyaagilum, Ammon Puththirarin Dhesaththaiyaagilum Kattikkondadhillaiye.
16 isravelar Egipthilirundhu Varugirapodhu, Vanaandharaththil Sivandha Samuththira Mattum Nadandhu, Pinbu Kaadhesukku Vandhu,

17 isravelar Edhomin Raajaavinidaththirku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi: Naangal Un Dhesaththuvazhiyaaik Kadandhu Pogattum Endru Sollachchonnaargal; Adharku Edhomin Raajaa Sevikodukkavillai; Appadiye Movaabin Raajaavidaththirkum Anuppinaargal; Avanum Sammadhikkavillai. Aadhalaal Isravelar Kaadhesile Thariththirundhu,

18 pinbu Vanaandharavazhiyaai Nadandhu Edhom Dhesaththaiyum Movaab Dhesaththaiyum Sutrippoi, Movaabin Dhesaththirkuk Kizhakke Vandhu, Movaabin Ellaikkul Pravesiyaamal, Movaabin Ellaiyaana Arnon Nadhikku Appaale Paalayamiranginaargal.

19 appozhudhu Isravelar Esponil Aalugira Seekon Ennum Emoriyarin Raajaavinidaththirku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi: Naangal Un Dhesaththu Vazhiyaai Engal Sthaanaththirkuk Kadandhupoga Idankodu Endru Sollachchonnaargal.
20 seekon Isravelarai Nambaadhadhinaal, Than Ellaiyaik Kadandhupogiradharku Idankodaamal Than Janangalaiyellaam Kootti, Yaagaasile Paalayamirangi, Isravelarode Yuththam Panninaan.

21 appozhudhu Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Seekonaiyum Avanudaiya Ellaa Janangalaiyum Isravelarin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Avargalai Muriya Adiththaargal; Appadiye Isravelar Andha Dhesaththile Kudiyirundha Emoriyarin Seemaiyaiyellaam Pidiththu, Arnon Thuvakki,
22 yaabokmattum Vanaandharam Thuvakki Yordhaanmattum Irukkira Emoriyarin Ellaiyaiyellaam Sudhandharamaaik Kattikkondaargal.
23 ippadi Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Emoriyaraith Thammudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelukku Munbaagath Thuraththiyirukka, Neer Andha Dhesaththaik Kattikkollaththagumaa?

24 ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Kaamos Umakku Munbaagath Thuraththugiravargalin Dhesaththai Neer Kattikkollamaatteero? Appadiye Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarengalukku Munbaagath Thuraththugiravargalin Dhesaththaiyellaam Naangalum Kattikkollugirom.

25 melum Sipporin Kumaaranaagiya Paalaak Ennum Movaabin Raajaavaip Paarkkilum Umakku Adhiga Nyaayam Undo? Avan Isravelode Eppodhaagilum Vazhakkaadinaanaa? Eppodhaagilum Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Yuththam Panninaanaa?

26 isravelar Esponilum Adhin Graamangalilum, Aaroverilum Adhin Graamangalilum, Arnon Nadhiyarugaana Ellaa Oorgalilum, Munnooru Varusham Kudiyirukkaiyil, Ivvalavukaalamaai Neengal Adhaith Thiruppikkollaadhe Ponadhenna?

27 naan Umakku Virodhamaaik Kutram Seyyavillai; Neer Enakku Virodhamaai Yuththam Pannugiradhinaal Neer Thaan Enakku Aniyaayam Seygireer; Nyaayaadhipadhiyaagiya Karththar Indru Isravel Puththirarukkum Ammon Puththirarukkum Nadunindru Nyaayam Theerkkakkadavar Endru Solli Anuppinaan.
28 aanaalum Ammon Puththirarin Raajaa Thanakku Yepthaa Solliyanuppina Vaarththaigalukku Sevikodaadhe Ponaan.

29 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Aavi Yepthaavin Mel Iranginaar; Avan Keeleyaaththaiyum Manaase Naattaiyum Kadandhupoi, Keeleyaaththilirukkira Mispaavukku Vandhu, Angeyirundhu Ammon Puththirarukku Virodhamaagap Ponaan.
30 appozhudhu Yepthaa Karththarukku Oru Poruththanaiyaip Panni: Dhevareer Ammon Puththirarai En Kaiyil Oppukkodukkave Oppukkoduththaal,

31 naan Ammon Puththiraridaththilirundhu Samaadhaanaththode Thirumbi Varumpodhu, En Veettu Vaasarpadiyilirundhu Enakku Edhirkondu Varuvadhu Edhuvo Adhukarththarukku Uriyadhaagum. Adhai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththuven Endraan.
32 yepthaa Ammon Puththirarinmel Yuththampanna, Avargalukku Virodhamaaip Purappattupponaan; Karththar Avargalai Avan Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar.

33 avan Avargalai Aarover Thuvakki Minniththirkup Pogumattum, Dhraatchaththottaththu Nilangal Varaikkum, Magaa Sangaaramaai Muriya Adiththu, Irubadhu Pattanangalaip Pidiththaan; Ippadi Ammon Puththirar Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaagath Thaazhththappattaargal.

34 yepthaa Mispaavilirukkira Than Veettukku Varugirapodhu, Idho, Avan Kumaaraththi Thamburu Vaasiththu Nadanancheydhu, Avanukku Edhirkonduvandhaal; Aval Avanukku Ore Pillaiyaanaval; Avalaiyallaamal Avanukkuk Kumaaranum Illai Kumaaraththiyum Illai.

35 avan Avalaik Kandavudane Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu: Aiyo! En Magale, Ennai Migavum Manamadiyavum Kalangavum Pannugiraai; Naan Karththarai Nokki En Vaayaith Thirandhu Sollivitten; Adhai Naan Maatrak Koodaadhu Endraan.

36 appozhudhu Aval: En Thagappane, Neer Karththarai Nokki Ummudaiya Vaayaith Thirandhu Pesineerallavo? Ammon Puththiraraagiya, Ummudaiya Saththurukkalukku Needhiyai Sarikkattum Jeyaththaik Karththar Umakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyinaal, Ummudaiya Vaayilirundhu Purappattapadiye Enakku Seyyum Endraal.

37 pinnum Aval Than Thagappanai Nokki: Neer Enakku Oru Kaariyam Seyya Vendum; Naan Malaigalinmel Poiththirindhu, Naanum En Thozhimaargalum En Kannimaiyinimiththam Dhukkankondaada, Enakku Irandumaadham Thavanaikodum Endraal.
38 adharku Avan: Poi Vaa Endru Avalai Irandu Maadhaththirku Anuppivittaan; Aval Than Thozhimaargalodum Koodappoi, Than Kannimaiyinimiththam Malaigalin Mel Dhukkankondaadi,
39 irandumaadham Mudindhapinbu, Than Thagappanidaththirkuth Thirumbivandhaal; Appozhudhu Avan Panniyirundha Than Poruththanaiyin Padi Avalukku Seydhaan; Aval Purushanai Ariyaadhirundhaal.
40 idhinimiththam Isravelin Kumaaraththigal Varushandhorum Poi, Naalu Naal Keeleyaaththiyanaana Yepthaavin Kumaaraththiyaikkuriththup Pulambuvadhu Isravelile Vazhakkamaayitru.
